name: W3Schools Dark Blue
description:
A nice simple dark blue theme for W3schools.  I made sure to click around to find all the odd parts that don't color the way you think they should.

Unfortunately some of the UI elements are not CSS, they're HTML.  So I wasn't able to make it super clean like I wanted.

*** no need for my greasemonkey script anymore ***

user.name: TheArkive
user.about:
I just theme stuff as I get to it, or as it annoys me...

The more it annoys me, the higher on the priority it gets to be themed!

I'll take requests, but I can't promise deadlines.

=======================

My style is always dark and easier on the eyes (been on a Dark Blue kick lately).  I prefer to have rows highlight on hover on almost every table.  I like buttons to do the same.
